name: Teeth Whitening
description: Brighten your smile with our professional teeth whitening services, which remove stains and discoloration to give you a whiter, healthier-looking smile.

name: Dental Implants
description: Our dental implants provide a permanent solution for missing teeth, restoring both functionality and aesthetics for a natural-looking smile.

name: Dental Crowns
description: Dental crowns are custom-made caps that cover damaged or decayed teeth, restoring shape, size, and function while protecting the underlying structure.

name: Root Canal Therapy
description: Root canal therapy treats infected or damaged tooth pulp, relieving pain and preserving the tooth structure to maintain a natural smile.

name: Orthodontics (Braces)
description: Our orthodontic treatments include braces and aligners, designed to correct misaligned teeth and jaws for improved aesthetics and functionality.

name: Dental Veneers
description: Dental veneers are thin, custom-made shells that cover the front surface of teeth, enhancing their appearance by changing color, shape, and size.

name: Tooth Extraction
description: Tooth extraction is the removal of damaged or decayed teeth, often necessary when a tooth cannot be saved or poses a risk to oral health.

name: Gum Disease Treatment
description: Gum disease treatment focuses on cleaning and repairing gum tissue to prevent further infection and maintain overall oral health.

name: Dental Cleaning
description: Professional dental cleaning removes plaque and tartar buildup from the teeth, promoting healthy gums and a brighter smile.

name: Fluoride Treatment
description: Fluoride treatment strengthens tooth enamel, protecting teeth from decay and reducing sensitivity.

name: Dental Sealants
description: Dental sealants are thin coatings applied to the chewing surfaces of molars to prevent cavities and protect against decay.

name: Invisalign (Clear Aligners)
description: Invisalign clear aligners offer a discreet alternative to traditional braces, gradually straightening teeth without metal brackets or wires.
